title: Add socket path check with warning notification
body: Issue #10: Store initial socket path, check for changes during Python script execution, and notify user with warning if socket path has changed.
author: mathe00

comments.body: I'm waiting to see if anyone gives me feedback to tell me if I did it wrong but if I get positive feedback or no feedback, I'm going to merge the pull request to add this feature to the main branch
Is there a reason to not reload the socket when the setting is changed?

> Is there a reason to not reload the socket when the setting is changed?

I can't think of any, but I think there could be some and I'd prefer everything to be well restarted to avoid any possible problems.
